name: Acupressure
summary: This move raises by two stages one of the following: Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, Speed, Evasion, or Accuracy. In doubles and triples, the user can use this move on an ally.
viability: As with most gimmicks, this can either end up horribly or game-changing. The issue is that you'll be relying on luck to get the boost you want. Having the evasion boost is probably the best situation, but that is a less than 20% chance. This is commonly seen on Shuckle sets aimed to stall the opponent to death, and with its shallow movepool it can't really hurt to try.
